name: Midnight Survival
description: This is a horror survival game where you find yourself in a mysterious dark forest, everything around you is a deadly boss level monster. Current build is basically alpha -5.0, water didn't load when switching to browser based, no mobs ATM, basically this is just the map of the world with a character controller to walk around in. if you have tips or suggestions all are appreciated any donations to this game will go straight into commissions for design and model building of the monsters
